text: *Samir Habibi* posted an update for *Daily Standup*

attachments.fallback:
How do you feel today?
good
attachments.title: How do you feel today?

attachments.fallback:
What did you do since Sep 30?
we finished the previous sprint and we were missing a bit also we started on a new sprint. I've been working with the chat page, both front-end and back-end
attachments.text: we finished the previous sprint and we were missing a bit also we started on a new sprint. I've been working with the chat page, both front-end and back-end
attachments.title: What did you do since Sep 30?

attachments.fallback:
What will you do today?
today I work primarily on the front-end and have completed the chat page.
attachments.text: today I work primarily on the front-end and have completed the chat page.
attachments.title: What will you do today?

yes, i have had some backend issues
